name: Vegan Chicken Noodle Soup
description: This vegan chicken noodle soup is the perfect comfort food for cold days! It's warming, healthy, and very easy to make. And it's packed with protein! The perfect dinner for the whole family.
recipeIngredient: 2 cups cooked chickpeas ((canned or cooked from dried chickpeas))
7 cups vegetable broth or vegan chicken broth
1 cup rotini pasta ((use brown rice pasta for a gluten-free version))

recipeInstructions.text: Finely chop the onion. Peel and slice the carrots as well as the celery.
recipeInstructions.name: Finely chop the onion. Peel and slice the carrots as well as the celery.

recipeInstructions.text: Heat some oil in a large pot and sauté the onions for about 2-3 minutes on medium heat until they become translucent. Then add the carrots and the celery and cook for another 4 minutes. Then stir in the marjoram, the oregano, the thyme, the bay leaves, and the nutritional yeast and cook until fragrant (about 30-60 seconds).
recipeInstructions.name: Heat some oil in a large pot and sauté the onions for about 2-3 minutes on medium heat until they become translucent. Then add the carrots and the celery and cook for another 4 minutes. Then stir in the marjoram, the oregano, the thyme, the bay leaves, and the nutritional yeast and cook until fragrant (about 30-60 seconds).

recipeInstructions.text: Add the vegetable broth, the miso paste, and the chickpeas and bring to a boil. Cook for 10 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the vegetable broth, the miso paste, and the chickpeas and bring to a boil. Cook for 10 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: After 10 minutes of cooking time, add the pasta. Cook for another 7-10 minutes depending on the pasta you use. Discard the bay leaves.
recipeInstructions.name: After 10 minutes of cooking time, add the pasta. Cook for another 7-10 minutes depending on the pasta you use. Discard the bay leaves.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve immediately and sprinkle the soup with freshly chopped parsley. It's great with crispy rustic bread!
recipeInstructions.name: Serve immediately and sprinkle the soup with freshly chopped parsley. It's great with crispy rustic bread!

keywords: how to make vegan chicken noodle soup, vegan chicken noodle soup, vegan noodle soup
